channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【Speedrunning Guide: Junior to Staff Engineer in 3 years】速通指南：3年初级工程师
item.description: 【This is a guest newsletter by Ryan Peterman, who was promoted from Junior to Staff Engineer in 3 years at Meta.】这是 Ryan Peterman 的客座新闻通讯，他在 Meta 的三年内从初级工程师晋升为高级工程师。

item.title: 【Distributed Caching: The Secret to High-Performance Applications】分布式缓存：高性能应用程序的秘密
item.description: 【The demand for high-speed, high-performance applications has skyrocketed in recent years.】近年来，对高速、高性能应用的需求猛增。

item.title: 【Uber’s Billion Trips Migration Setup with Zero Downtime】Uber 十亿次行程迁移设置零停机
item.description: 【Maintaining uptime during system upgrades or migrations is essential, especially for high-stakes, real-time platforms like Uber's trip fulfillment system.】在系统升级或迁移期间保持正常运行至关重要，尤其是对于 Uber 的行程履行系统等高风险实时平台。

item.title: 【EP137: Proxy vs Reverse Proxy】EP137：代理与反向代理
item.description: 【A forward proxy is a server that sits between user devices and the internet. A forward proxy is commonly used for:】转发代理是位于用户设备和互联网之间的服务器。转发代理通常用于：

item.title: 【EP136: The Ultimate DevOps Developer Roadmap】EP136：终极 DevOps 开发者路线图
item.description: 【Generate Handwritten SDKs (Sponsored)】生成手写 SDK（赞助）

item.title: 【A Pattern Every Modern Developer Should Know: CQRS】每个现代开发人员都应该知道的模式：CQRS
item.description: 【CQRS, which stands for Command Query Responsibility Segregation, is an architectural pattern that separates the concerns of reading and writing data.】CQRS（Command Query Responsibility Segregation）的缩写，是一种分离数据读写关注点的架构模式。

item.title: 【How McDonald Sells Millions of Burgers Per Day With Event-Driven Architecture】麦当劳如何通过事件驱动架构每天销售数百万个汉堡
item.description: 【Cloud-scale monitoring with AWS and Datadog (Sponsored)】使用 AWS 和 Datadog 进行云规模监控（赞助）

item.title: 【Our New Book, Generative AI System Design Interview, Is Now Available】我们的新书《生成式人工智能系统设计访谈》现已推出
item.description: 【Our new book Generative AI System Design Interview is available on Amazon!】我们的新书《生成式人工智能系统设计访谈》已在亚马逊上发售！
